newsitem.title: RUSSIA: Russia Jan-May oil output flat yr-yr, products down.
newsitem.headline: Russia Jan-May oil output flat yr-yr, products down.

text.p: Russian crude oil output was flat on year-ago levels at 122 million tonnes, State Statistics Committee figures showed on Tuesday.

Output of refined oil products fell over the same period, with production of heavy fuel oil, or mazut, down five percent on year-ago levels. May production of mazut was 11 percent down on 1996 levels.
